fields.name: Time To Detect
fields.description: The time it took before the problem was detected, from when the problem started.

fields.name: Time To Acknowledge
fields.description: The time it took before the incident was declared, from when the problem started.

fields.name: Time To Repair
fields.description: The time it took to act (rollback, fix...), from when the incident was declared.

fields.name: Time To Fix
fields.description: The time it took for our teams to put services back in an healthy state, from when the incident was declared.

fields.name: Time To Recovery
fields.description: The time it took for our teams to put services back in an healthy state, from when the problem started.

fields.name: Time To Respond
fields.description: The time it took for our teams to put services back in an healthy state, from when the problem was detected.

fields.name: Time To Resolve
fields.description: The time it took before the incident was resolved, from when it started.
